readme:
# always-up

A package that helps you update the Atom -- directly from the repository.

![always-up](http://i.imgur.com/UEuZKRE.jpg)

## Activate

By default, you can choose to activate - `always-up:toggle` - the package in two different ways:

* Press `cmd-shift-P` and type "always"
* Press `cmd-alt-,`

## Usage

* Fill the field with the full path of the Atom clone
* Click *Update now* and wait
* Update the `atom` command via your preference terminal with the command:
```bash
cd /full/path/of/atom/clone && sudo script/grunt install
```
* Restart Atom
